titles.title: A resolution informing the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/5/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Informs the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.
